mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: ADAHealth is an independent platform dedicated to protecting Cardano delegators by providing transparency around retired stake pools.
mission.paragraph2: When a stake pool retires without delegators moving their stake, those delegators stop earning rewards. Currently, over â‚³86 million ADA is locked in retired pools, affecting more than 47,000 wallets.
mission.paragraph3: We built ADAHealth to give the community easy access to this critical information, helping delegators protect their stake and maximize their rewards.
